recipesJson.name: Blues Clues - A Blue Freezie
recipesJson.author: westcoastclouds
recipesJson.description:
We are looking for Blue's Clues, we are looking for Blue's Clues, we are looking for Blue's Clues, because we're really smart! 

This is the Blue Freezie, obviously the best type of freezie, besides the white one depending on the brand of freezie. No cooling agent but feel free to add your own.

reviews.text: Really been enjoying this recipe. I increased the CAP BRCC to 2% and itâ€™s been great! After a week steep it really tastes like a blue freezie pop to me! Thank you

Good to see Slush not 8% for a change. I'm going to mix it up right now because this is up my alley. Have you tried a touch of Bilberry in it or any other Raspberry like INW? Just curious because you didn't leave any notes and I'd make a few batches to see how it compares and let you know how it went.
Very tasty and good blue raspberry slush! Most of the time people say blue raspberry slushy I cringe because no one ever gets it right. This my friend is a very solid recipe!
